sys_properties.description:
Controls how many plugins can be updated in a single execution of the UpdateAllPlugins script. This helps prevent overloading the system and allows for controlled, incremental updates.
Default: 10 Type: Integer Valid values: Any positive integer
Example: If set to 5, the script will update up to 5 plugins in one run, then stop. This is useful for: - Large instances with many plugins - Controlling system load during updates - Ensuring updates don't timeout - Allowing for manual verification between batches
Note: If there are more plugins to update than the batch size, the script will log how many remain and can be run again to process the next batch.
sys_properties.name: x_snc_update_all.plugin.update.batch.size
